General.Name: Shen Zhen Australis Electronic Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shen Zhen Australis Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of mobile phone components with backlight display modules. Its products are used in various display fields, such as smart phones and car monitors, medical displays, industrial control equipment displays, home appliance displays, and other consumer electronics displays. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Congming  Peng
